name: reactify-tsx
description: Advanced plugin for VsCode with visual tools and code assistance making development faster and more convenient.

commands.title: Reactify TSX: Extraer arrow function a handler

editor/context.when: editorLangId == typescriptreact || editorLangId == javascriptreact || editorLangId == typescript || editorLangId == javascript

keybindings.when: editorTextFocus && (editorLangId == typescriptreact || editorLangId == javascriptreact || editorLangId == typescript || editorLangId == javascript)

scripts.compile: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: yarn run check-types && yarn run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: yarn run compile-tests && yarn run compile && yarn run lint
